description: oval body with vertical flutes; body lightly engraved with borders of fringed drapery festoons hung with looped tassels suspended from narrow bands of wave-scroll ornament at shoulder and base; straight tapering spout slants up from base; flush-hinged slightly domed cover engraved with sunburst; silver-tipped wooden mushroom-shaped finial; wood loop handle; 1999.44.A in white paint on underside; stand has scalloped edges matching flutes on body of teapot; "MA" engraved at center; same engraving pattern around edges; four fluted feet; names and dates engraved on underside; 1999.44.B in white paint on underside
dimension:
6 x 11 1/2 in. (15.24 x 29.21 cm) (object part, Teapot)
7/8 x 4 7/8 x 7 1/4 in. (2.22 x 12.38 x 18.42 cm) (object part, Stand)
title: Adams-Quincy Teapot and Stand
